trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>属性，而不是设置的属性返回的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>当前单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件是与事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，用户将在其中编辑选定单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，它表示正在编辑的单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已编辑单元格的单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />，它表示正在编辑的单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>属性，而不是设置的属性返回的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A> property of the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>当前单元格的属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event is associated with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`dataGridView1`并确保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件是与事件处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，指定的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示的用于编辑选定单元格的值的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，它显示一个区域供用户输入或更改选定单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>属性，而不是设置的属性返回的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: In the example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler adds a handler for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序添加的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>事件。

trans-unit.source: The editing control is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 编辑控件被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>来处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
